name: Pocobot's Obligation
description:
Pocobot must travel through the inner workings of the reactor facility to pair all of the reactors with their power cores

This game takes advantage of a rendering technique called **Sprite Stacking** to create the illusion of a 3rd dimension. However, this game is entirely in 2D!

The game focuses around a few elements:

Pocobot

Moves around and pushes things into place. Control him to bring the facility back online

Reactors

Produce energy, but also create heat. Don't allow their thermals to reach zero!

Coolers

These keep the thermals of the reactors in check to keep them running smoothly

Power Cores

These store energy, charge them up with the reactors to restore power to the facility

Time Button

Stand on this button to have time move forward more quickly. Helpful for slow charging Power Cores

Doors

These need to be powered to move through the facility
